sentences.sentence: That such deep events do occur has been accepted only since 1927 when the seismologist Kiyoo Wadati convincingly demonstrated their existence.
sentences.translation: 直到1927年地震学家 Kiyoo Wadati 证明了这种深度地震的存在，人们才承认这种现象确实存在。

sentences.sentence: Italian seismologist Dario Tedesco has spent the last 15 years studying Nyiragongo, with funding from the European Union.
sentences.translation: 获得欧盟资助的意大利地震学家达利奥·特德斯库在过去15年中一直对于尼拉贡戈火山进行研究。

sentences.sentence: Even though there is currently no way to predict earthquakes, seismologist Mike Blanpied of the USGS has grounds for optimism.
sentences.translation: 即使目前还没有方法能够预测地震，来自美国地质调查局的地震学家Mike Blanpied仍然表示了乐观。
